PatchEverything:BlasphemyRunMod.NAME: Blasphemy
PatchEverything:BlasphemyRunMod.DESCRIPTION: Start combat in Divinity and die next turn. Removes all defends from the deck.

PatchEverything:CreativeAIRunMod.NAME: Creative AI
PatchEverything:CreativeAIRunMod.DESCRIPTION: Start combat with Creative AI active. Reduce base card draw by 1.
